name: part_003
file: tmp_【 #沙花叉クロヱ生誕LIVE 】沙花叉クロヱと不思議なキノコ 【ホロライブ⧸沙花叉クロヱ】 [rvIy1IOZNtA]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Sakamata Chloe begins her performance with a slow, melodic intro of 'Our Bright Parade' on a dark stage with red spotlighting.
The tempo picks up as the stage transforms into a vibrant, candy-themed wonderland with colorful visuals and pyrotechnics.
Transition into the next song, 'Kono Sora ga Trigger', with a change in atmosphere and on-screen titles.

subtitles.original: パレパレパレ 輝くんだよ
subtitles.english: Pare-pare-pare, it's shining.

subtitles.original: 呼び合う声を合図に
subtitles.english: With our calling voices as the signal.

subtitles.original: パレパレパレ 探しに行く
subtitles.english: Pare-pare-pare, let's go search.

subtitles.original: スタートは何度だって
subtitles.english: No matter how many times we start.

subtitles.original: 皆様、盛り上がっていきましょう！
subtitles.english: Everyone, let's get excited!

subtitles.original:
Our Bright Parade
作詞・作曲・編曲 堀江晶太
subtitles.english:
Our Bright Parade
Lyrics, Comp., & Arr.: Shota Horie

subtitles.original: ただ 独り言綴った
subtitles.english: I just wrote down some monologues.

subtitles.original: ただ 始まりたくて走った
subtitles.english: I just ran because I wanted to begin.

subtitles.original: 遠く グラデーションに灯った
subtitles.english: A distant gradation lit up.

subtitles.original: それは 眩しすぎたままで
subtitles.english: It remained far too dazzling.

subtitles.original: それは 優しすぎる思い出
subtitles.english: It's a memory that's far too kind.

subtitles.original: もっと近づけと手を伸ばした
subtitles.english: I reached out my hand to get closer.

subtitles.original: 思いがけず結び合った
subtitles.english: We were connected unexpectedly.

subtitles.original: ほら今 迷い子は僕らになった
subtitles.english: Look, now we've become the lost children.

subtitles.original: パレパレパレ 輝くんだよ
subtitles.english: Pare-pare-pare, it's shining.

subtitles.original: 悔しさも愛おしさも 全部おいで
subtitles.english: Come along with all your regrets and affections.

subtitles.original: 風 夢 羽 飛び立つさ
subtitles.english: Wind, dreams, wings—we'll take flight.

subtitles.original: 囁かな彩りばかり 終わりなき兆し
subtitles.english: Only modest colors, signs that never end.

subtitles.original: 君を見つけたこと 胸を張るよ
subtitles.english: I'm proud that I found you.

subtitles.original: ここから これから
subtitles.english: From here, from now on.

subtitles.original: まだ 頼りない予感を
subtitles.english: Sing about this still-unreliable premonition,

subtitles.original: 歌おう 恥ずかしくなんてないよ
subtitles.english: Let's sing it—it's nothing to be ashamed of.

subtitles.original: 誰も解けないイマジナリー
subtitles.english: An imaginary world no one can solve.

subtitles.original: いつかまた会えるおまじない
subtitles.english: A charm to meet again someday.

subtitles.original: あの日 ゼロに始まったストーリー
subtitles.english: The story that began from zero that day.

subtitles.original: 数えきれない言の葉
subtitles.english: Countless words.

subtitles.original: 数えるような思いじゃないさ
subtitles.english: It's not a feeling you can count.

subtitles.original: ほら今 僕らをひとつと呼ぼう
subtitles.english: Look, now let's call us one.

subtitles.original: パレパレパレ 美しいんだよ
subtitles.english: Pare-pare-pare, it's beautiful.

subtitles.original: 許し合える切なさ 夜は開けてく
subtitles.english: Sadness of forgiving, the night is breaking.

subtitles.original: 雨 晴れ 晴れ また隣 空
subtitles.english: Rain, sun, sun, the sky next to us again.

subtitles.original: 相応しい旅路とは 君と歩くことさ
subtitles.english: The right journey is one walked with you.

subtitles.original: 君と歩くことなんだ
subtitles.english: It's all about walking with you.

subtitles.original: ただいま も 聞けば
subtitles.english: If I hear 'I'm home,'

subtitles.original: おかえりって叫ぶよ
subtitles.english: I'll shout back 'Welcome back.'

subtitles.original: 当たり前じゃないか
subtitles.english: Isn't that obvious?

subtitles.original: パレパレパレ 輝くんだよ
subtitles.english: Pare-pare-pare, it's shining.

subtitles.original: 暗がりを満たすのは 君だ 僕だ
subtitles.english: It's you and me who fill the darkness.

subtitles.original: パレパレパレ 輝くんだよ
subtitles.english: Pare-pare-pare, it's shining.

subtitles.original: 悔しさも愛おしさも 全部おいで
subtitles.english: Come along with all your regrets and affections.

subtitles.original: 風 夢 羽 飛び立つさ
subtitles.english: Wind, dreams, wings—we'll take flight.

subtitles.original: 囁かな彩りばかり 終わりなき兆し
subtitles.english: Only modest colors, signs that never end.

subtitles.original: 君と飛び込んでいこう 素敵なスタートさ
subtitles.english: Let's dive in with you, it's a wonderful start.

subtitles.original: ここから これから
subtitles.english: From here, from now on.

subtitles.original:
この空がトリガー
作詞 指原莉乃 作曲 塚田耕平
subtitles.english:
Kono Sora ga Trigger
Lyrics: Rino Sashihara, Comp.: Kohei Tsukada

subtitles.original: 眩しい太陽を見上げたとき
subtitles.english: When I looked up at the dazzling sun.

subtitles.original: 君に会いたくなった
subtitles.english: I wanted to see you.
